data.name: ReadCourtCaption
data.value: select LGA_IDENTIFIER, COURT_CAPTION_NO, LINE from CKT_COURT_CAPTION where @lgaIdentifier = LGA_IDENTIFIER

data.name: ReadLegalAction
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, FILED_DT, COURT_CASE_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId
